name: Rise Against
wikiSummary: Rise Against are a punk rock band from Chicago, Illinois. Formed in 1999, and originally performing under the name Transistor Revolt, they released a self-produced demo entitled Transistor Revolt in 2000, a year before signing with Fat Wreck Chords to release their first two albums, The Unraveling in 2001, and Revolutions Per Minute in 2003. They later switched to Dreamworks Records and recorded their album Siren Song of the Counter Culture. Read more about Rise Against on Last.fm.

They later switched to Dreamworks Records and recorded their album Siren Song of the Counter Culture. Read more about Rise Against on Last.fm.
